EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Milan_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed - Pivotal Analytics Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Analytics Roadshow! Please see your event details below.
Date: Wednesday, 19 April 2017 {{my.Save the Date Milan:default=edit me}}
Time:
8.30am - 1.15pm Strategy Session 1.15pm - 5.15pm Data Science Workshop Session (Limited Seating and for practitioners only)
Location::
Pivotal Paris Office Via Merano 16 20127 Milano (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Via+Merano,+16,+20127+Milano,+Italy/@45.4973362,9.2191607,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x4786c71edb4c80d5:0x46d832395db9e0de!8m2!3d45.4973325!4d9.2213494]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/milan?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
If you have any questions, feel free to email Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
